a b : V

ι : Sort ?u.10234
V : Type u
W : Type v
G : SimpleGraph V
G₁ G₂ : Subgraph G
a b : V

e : Sym2 V
v : V
he : e ∈ edgeSet G'
hv : v ∈ e
⊢ v ∈ G'.verts
content:

  refine' Sym2.ind (fun v w he ↦ _) e he

  rcases Sym2.mem_iff.mp hv with (rfl | rfl)
  · exact G'.edge_vert he
  · exact G'.edge_vert (G'.symm he)
